title: Implement Winter Weather Precautions
description: With freezing temperatures forecast, a superintendent must implement winter weather precautions to protect the site and materials.

tasks.description: Order and place concrete curing blankets on all recently poured concrete to prevent freezing.
tasks.expected_outcome: Blankets are placed on all exposed concrete.

tasks.description: Ensure any temporary water lines are drained to prevent them from bursting.
Log all winter precaution activities in the daily log.
